SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.util.par

Class ParShapesMesh

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.util.par.ParShapesMesh
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pointer
public class ParShapesMesh extends Struct
The par_shapes.h mesh structure.

LWJGL note: in the default build, PAR_SHAPES_T is uint32_t.

Layout


 struct par_shapes_mesh {
     float * points(int);
     int npoints();
     PAR_SHAPES_T * triangles(int);
     int ntriangles();
     float * normals(int);
     float * tcoords(int);
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • ParShapesMesh

      public ParShapesMesh(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a ParShapesMesh instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.

      Returns:

    • normals

      @Nullable public FloatBuffer normals(int capacity)
      Parameters:
      capacity - the number of elements in the returned buffer
      Returns:
      an optional list of 3-tuples (X Y Z X Y Z...) for the vertex normals

    • tcoords

      @Nullable public FloatBuffer tcoords(int capacity)
      Parameters:
      capacity - the number of elements in the returned buffer
      Returns:
      an optional list of 2-tuples (U V U V U V...) for the vertex texture coordinates
